error.mqtt: Sorry, there was a communication error with the Snips platform.
error.config: Sorry, there was an error with your config file.
error.locale: Sorry, there was an error with your language settings.
error.intentNotRecognized: Sorry, I did not understand your request.

createAlarm: Would you like to create one?
name: How should I name this alarm?
time: When should I set this alarm for?
nameAndTime: When should I set this alarm and how should I name it?

alarm_SetFor_: Okay, alarm: {{ name }} is set for {{ time }}.

ask.ifListRestAlarms: Would you like to list all the remaining alarms?

info.foundComingAlarms: I have found {{ number }} coming alarm{{odd}}.
info.alarmSetFor: Alarm: {{ name }}, set for {{ datetime }} {{ recurrence }}.
info.noAlarmFound: It seems like you have no alarm set for the moment.
info.noSuchAlarmsFound: It seems like you have no such alarm set for the moment.
info.found_AlarmsNamed_: I have found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }}.
info.found_AlarmsSetFor_: I have found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} set for {{ time }}.
info.found_AlarmsSetForEvery_: I have found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} set for each {{ recurrence }}.
info.found_AlarmsNamed_AndSetFor_: I have found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }} set for {{ time }}.
info.found_AlarmsNamed_AndSetForEvery_: I have found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }} set for each {{ recurrence }}.
